newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Creative says gets more legal relief.
newsitem.headline: Creative says gets more legal relief.

text.p: Creative Technology Ltd said on Monday it and U.S. subsidiary Creative Labs Inc had obtained additional preliminary injunction in their lawsuit against Cyrix Corp and some OEM customers of Cyrix's Media GX chip, including Compaq.

Creative Technology filed a lawsuit in a U.S. district court on March 17 alleging Cyrix and its Media GX customers were misleading consumers about the capabilities and source of the computer audio solution provided by the Cyrix Media GX chipset.
The court ordered that defendants switch to alternate drivers that Creative is making available to them free of charge and that do not cause the misleading screens to appear.
Creative Technology is a provider of advanced multimedia solutions for personal computers, including sound, graphics, communications and video conferencing products.
